description: Detect modification of services configuration (ImagePath, FailureCommand and ServiceDLL) in registry by processes with Medium integrity level Author: Teymur Kheirkhabarov. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Possible Privilege Escalation via Service Permissions Weakness
query: (IntegrityLevel:"Medium" AND process.command_line:*ControlSet* AND process.command_line:*services* AND process.command_line:(*\\ImagePath* OR *\\FailureCommand* OR *\\ServiceDll*))
